nodes.text: The year 37,000 before the Battle of Yavin (BBY) was a period of time in the Pre-Republic era.

Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi Book One—Force Storm, the trade paperback for the Force Storm miniseries in the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series, established the boundaries of the Before the Republic era as 37,000 and 25,000 BBY. However, no in-universe events have been established as occurring in this year.
